text: Thanks Karl, This is a little confusing the link that you gave has the link for ESXi but that issue is about ESXi secure boot issue, which does not affect us. I am more worried about the .RTC issues if you are running Veeam. We are upgrading to 8 and I hope to be finished by end of next week. %40BL0PR18MB2099.namprd18.prod.outlook.com
